Hello there!

My name is Samantha Says. I have no prior experience with making websites, so this is a constant learning experience for me!
Some parts will look under construction. Y'know, because they are.

In the future, this website will hold:

  • A catalogue of my Elder Scrolls characters
  • My modlists for various games
  • Any creative writing I may end up doing (probably about The Elder Scrolls)
  • A gallery of pretty screenshots I've taken!
  • Some niche guides that I've made for various people
  • Maybe even an Elder Scrolls idle game... if Bethesda won't make one, then I will

Until then, thanks for visiting! You can also find me on Twitter


Proud ambassador of Green Man Gaming
